name: supereminent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
more important or better than others: He was a man of supereminent genius. The super-eminent reputation of French cuisine is built upon its sauces.
More examplesFewer examplesThe super-eminent reputation of our product is due to the farms on which it is grown.She insists on the supereminent authority of the court.They believed their religion to be supereminent.Catholics believe that the Church of Rome is supereminent over other churches.Only those of super-eminent mind can understand the argument.
